channel.title: Portal 2 ARG Speculation Stuffs
channel.description:
From the latest blog post on Thinking With Portals: [quote] Like words? Ore are you more a fan of pictures? Don't worry, there's something for everyone to enjoy in the conclusion of Valve's new comic, Portal 2: Lab Rat, which is now available for your reading and/or picture-looking pleasure.
Also of note for time-keeping enthusiasts: the calendar experts here at Valve have crunched some numbers, and have conclusively decided on [b]7AM EST, April 19th, 2011[/b], as the exact moment that Portal 2 will be available on Steam. That means [b]you've got a finite and rapidly shrinking window for being able to tell your friends, "Oh, is Portal 2 out now? I wouldn't know. Because I pre-ordered it."[/b] Look us in the eye and tell us this isn't something you'd like to be able to tell your friends. [b]You still can[/b]. [/quote] From the mailboxes in the ARG ([url]https://valvearg.com/wiki/Everythingisfinehere_mail#Received_April_11th[/url]) [quote] You have earned a rest. Refresh yourself in the chamber of your choice and contemplate the diverse ramifications of applied information theory. [b]Relax for a [u]few days[/u][/b]. Enjoy recess with the rest of the class. Kiss sweet loved ones and inhale sweet air and eat and wear sweet clothing and foods.
[b]There will be a test later.[/b]
connection.build.99744+/-29999.waiting [/quote] (Screen-capture: [url]https://imgur.com/HOGOI[/url])
And finally, the puzzle gaben sent out revealed the following message:
[b]4/19/2011_7AM=4/15/2011_9AM[/b][/SIZE]
Is it possible they're going to release the game to pre-orderererers early?
Note: conclusions and pieces of information to'lly stolen from the following thread: [url]https://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=1831508[/url]

item.title: Portal 2 ARG Speculation Stuffs
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
1746… how are that many people already playing Portal? Well, I don’t think I’m going to end up too pissed. The game comes out in like 12 minutes. But I have a fucking English essay to finish. Oh the wonderful irony; the game actually does come out well before I go to sleep, btu I don’t ahve any free time to play it. I hate my English class.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 ARG Speculation Stuffs
item.dc:creator: BlackWing94
item.description:
garrthbarrttinn:

Eh I personally didn’t spend that much time. I just think it’s a huge middle finger to give use this incredibly difficult task and a possibly great reward, and then have the task take so long you hardly even get the reward.

I kinda don’t think that the game releasing early is the only reward. I mean just look at how much time they got left. At this rate, they might as well wait till midnight.

Valve wouldn’t fuck them over like that…would they?

Read full topic

Eh I personally didn’t spend that much time. I just think it’s a huge middle finger to give use this incredibly difficult task and a possibly great reward, and then have the task take so long you hardly even get the reward.

item.title: Portal 2 ARG Speculation Stuffs
item.dc:creator: garrthbarrttinn
item.description:
If Portal 2 isn’t out early enough tonight for me to play it I’ll be really pissed. And I’m already pretty pissed that it wasn’t out by the time I got home.

They’ve dangled this reward in our faces and made us put so much work into it only to find that we’re not going to get really any kind of reward in the end.

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 ARG Speculation Stuffs
item.dc:creator: GravityGun
item.description:
I bought this game for PC for the very reason of the ARG and because portal is awesome and I beat the first one twice. If valve can’t release the game today or even tonight I would feel this whole ARG thing is a waste of my time and I will be pretty pizzed off and I would never care about anymore ARG’s from valve… EVEN HALF-LIFE. This whole thing has had me hyped up for 4 days and i’ve spent much of my time looking at https://www.aperturescience.com/glados@home/

I told all my friends it was gonna be released early for PC and I was gonna play it as soon as it came out. If its released a few hours before real release while I’m in school till 3:00 PM then this whole thing has made me do somtin I never felt… Hate Valve

Read full topic

item.title: Portal 2 ARG Speculation Stuffs
item.dc:creator: coolgreek
item.description:
So you’re telling me that hundreds of loyal fans spent $35 and countless hours to unlock this game, only to have it release a few measly hours before the actual release date?
Sorry Valve, I’m not with you on this one. I think this was rigged from the beginning, and I would feel insulted if I spent the time to participate in the ARG.

EDIT: Proof from page source:

var g_currentPotatoConsumptionRate = 11.6771584699;
var elapsedSeconds = Math.round( new Date().getTime() ) - g_currentPotatoCountTimestamp * 1000;
var consumedPotatoes = ( elapsedSeconds / 1000 ) * g_currentPotatoConsumptionRate;
var remaining = Math.round( g_currentPotatoCount - consumedPotatoes );

Notice the consumption rate. Probably calculated to give an exact time when Valve wanted the potatoes to run out (and presumably the game to release).

Read full topic
